price: ߘߊ߲ߞߊ ߟߵߌ ߡߊ߬ ߛߍߣߍ߲߬ ߝߏ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߛߌ߰ ߛߙߊ߬ߟߌ ߟߏ߲ ߠߊ߫
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
